Closet.name: Closet
Closet.desc: This isn't a very large or clean closet.

door.desc: The door leads back into the room.
door.inspection: The door is plain and wooden.

Small Cave.name: Small Cave
Small Cave.desc: This isn't a very large or clean closet.

s.desc: The opening of the cave leads back into the circle room.
s.inspection: The edges of the opening are cracked and rough.

old man.name: old man
old man.desc: An old man stoically stands at the back of the gave.

iron sword.name: iron sword
iron sword.desc: There is an iron sword on the ground.
iron sword.inspection: The iron sword is of crude workmanship, but it should be usable.

Circle Room.name: Circle Room
Circle Room.desc: You stand in a circular room crafted in stone.

door.desc: There is a door on one side.
door.inspection: The door is plain and wooden.

n.desc: There is a mouth of a cave to the north.
n.inspection: The cave opening glows with a soft flickering light.

s.desc: There is a hallway to the south.
s.inspection: The hallway seems narrow and foreboding.

e.desc: There is a pathway to the east.

leather armor.name: leather armor
leather armor.desc: There is a set of leather armor lying in a heap.
leather armor.inspection: The armor is worn but light and sturdy.

leaf.name: leaf
leaf.desc: A leaf lies on the ground.

Next Room.name: Next Room
Next Room.desc: You are in the next room over.

w.desc: There is a pathway to the west.
w.inspection: The path expands into a larger room.

ogre.name: ogre
ogre.desc: The ogre stands there menacingly with a club.
ogre.inspection: The ogre is holding a long club made of wood. He is wearing nothing but a loincloth and a leather jerkin.

club.name: club
club.desc: There is a club on the ground.
club.inspection: The club is very thick and heavy.

goblin.name: goblin
goblin.desc: The goblin cowers in a corner holding a knife.
goblin.inspection: The goblin is small, grey-green, and skinny. He is brandishing a knife.

Long Hallway.name: Long Hallway
Long Hallway.desc: You are in a long, dark hallway.

n.desc: There is a room to the north.
n.inspection: The hallway seems narrow and foreboding.

large capsule.name: large capsule
large capsule.desc: There is a large capsule here.
large capsule.inspection: The capsule appears to be able to hold things.

curious object.name: curious object
curious object.desc: There is a curious object here.
curious object.inspection: The object's appearance confuses your weak mind.
